column4: is there an easy way to check if a user is connected to my proxy? I also want to be notified by mail when this user is connected to my proxy? how do I achieve this
No, there is no easy way.
ok is there a way to achieve this I am using squid?
Sounds like heavy scripting, on-the-fly log file analysis, and usage of cron and smtp to inform you via mail.
ok
I told you "no" already ;)
You have to grep the logs.

man grep :) or egrep - grep "this|that" filename

What do you want to do?
from the given access.log I want to get the username and the word denied in order to know what type of website this user wanted to access without my permission
